title: Is there a name yet given to children born in this decade, 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Is there a name yet given to children born in this decade, 2020?” {update: The rhyming names Duo-2–0’s for those born in the 2020’s and Duo-trios for those born in the 2030’s are worth watching. With the 30-year time period of 2016–2046 fitting the bill of the Duo-Dynamic generation there would be a type of Woodstock effect that would grandmother/grandfather in those born in the 2016–2019 range as the Duo-teeno’s of the Duo-Dynamic generation.} “Re-Visionists” befits the situation as does “Duo-Dynamics” but nothing’s firmed up yet. 2019 marks the end of the Generation Z aka the ‘snowflake generation’ with Generation Alpha one of the proposed names for the follow-up generation born in the 2020–2050 range. However politically, the 2020 decade itself is already slated to be one of a more perfect vision, 20/20 hindsight in viewing America’s past and 20/20 foresight in looking to the USA’s future. Which leaves the precise name for those born in the 2020’s still up for grabs but most likely vision related with a computer-like connection with action to it. With the reboot and rebirth of the Founders original intent for the Nation presently underway, mathematically speaking those born in the 2020’s are in the ‘Visionary 2.0’ decade. The Duo-Dynamics of the 2020’s won’t suffer from the myopic, political mono-vision of Generation Z. They will be the leaders and people of action for generations to come.
